PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-05662008-03-11,  ,  IA&ND,  , 
ActIndian Act
PrecisAuthority to (a) enter into a specific claim SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT with the MICHIPICOTEN INDIAN BAND for the purpose of conpensating the Michipicoten Indian Band for its specific claim wiht respect to the failure by Canada to recognize certain lands east and west of the surveyed boundaries of its Gros Cap Indian Reserve No. 49 as having attained reserve status, and (b) accept the Instrument of Absolute Surrender of the lands described in Article 11 of the settlement agreement.
AttachmentsAttachment
